Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring clear and conspicuous labeling of all consumable commodities
Summary: Relates to requiring clear and conspicuous labeling of all consumable commodities, including infant formula.
LawCode: Add ยง391-u, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring the labeling of all consumable commodities containing genetically modified organisms
